title: adaptive security
extract: Adaptive Security is an approach to cybersecurity that analyzes behaviors and events to protect against and adapt to threats before they happen. With an Adaptive Security Architecture, an organization can continuously assess risk and automatically provide proportional enforcement that can be dialed up or down.
